data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shear, William A. (2018): The centipede family Anopsobiidae new to North America, with the description of a new genus and species and notes on the Henicopidae of North America and the Anopsobiidae of the Northern Hemisphere (Chilopoda, Lithobiomorpha). Zootaxa 4422 (2): 259-283, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4422.2.6|20 occurrences
